title: My rank disappears and says 'Placements' with my win/loss below it
body: So, how do I fix this?

replies.body: Yep, my client's back to normal! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IttJnWFe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-08T22:02:04.693+0000)
>
> Yes, this is happening to everyone at the moment. It's an issue we've been made aware of and are actively looking into a fix. I can't say when one will roll out, since we don't know yet, but please let me know if you have any questions.
Can we still play ranked games and still accrue points if we win or lose in our current placements?
It was an ongoing issue that may have been resolved by now. Restart your client and let me know if you still see this issue.
